original_text: Jesus answered them, ‘You should not have needed to look for me. I must be doing what my Father wants me to do. You should have known that.’
korean_text: 예수께서 이르시되 어찌하여 나를 찾으셨나이까 내가 내 아버지 집에 있어야 될 줄을 알지 못하셨나이까 하시니

sentences.original_text: You should not have needed to look for me
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 나를 찾으려 할 필요가 없었을 것이다

sentences.original_text: what my Father wants me to do
sentences.korean_translation: 내 아버지께서 내가 하기를 원하시는 것을
